title: mich
author: mich
content: So I am wanting to know what are some good Computer monitors that everyone use because Im currently using one that hurts my eyes.I do not know so much about Computer Monitors but I hope to purchase it that won't cause eye strain and my budget is 100 dollars.TIA

comments.author: FinalSolution
comments.body: Curved monitors tire the eyes less those of samsung are excellent but cost a little more than $ 100

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I can only afford an 100 dollar monitor now that the economy is so bad I want budget friendly.  I cant afford a nice curve one. A 100 dollar monitor that can help me get my work done, doesn't need to be fancy and the screen size can be smaller then  bigger.  I will be using it for work and not to play computer games or anything like this.

comments.author: Wreeck
comments.body: I like Msi price super quality

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Ended up going with the SKitphrati 17 inch PC Monitor LED Monitor 1440x900, 60HZ.I consider it a Good Deal since only paid ₩ 122545 which is about 92 usd shipped.

comments.author: briandean
comments.body: I am using new Dell Alienware AW3423DW..so far this is the best at this age
